channel.title: Class that are still a bit dull
channel.description:
Court Wizard
Its still kind of dull to play .
I feel like the ice ward ability is too valuable to use on yolo targeting . So I spend the first 3-4 nights hoping that I don't die before an investigator or prince reveals themselves some how . then if they do I ice ward them.
I get that its quite powerful but it feels wasteful to do anything early game .
Noble
Id made my peace with the Noble , it was kind of getting exciting with the PMs and you could do some fun stuff .
Now its again quite powerful but not really much to do in the early game , it comes into focus a bit at later stages but stopping people hanging the prince for example just means that the noble gets hung this turn instead . The evils know who is who .
The only use I tend to get out of this that's useful is for some reason I know something everyone else don't , like people are getting succeed in my scorned etc . But I cant ever really be sure .
Again the extra votes for execute are a bit meh . If we have not got the votes to get someone up what's the point in having the votes to swing the axe and if we have got the votes to get them up , what's the point in having the extra vote , we should already have enough to hang .
So again it comes down to only being useful if as a bd I know more than the other bd
Still just these two really that are groans when I get them .
